mapper.select:
select dis.id,dis.name,dis.longitude,dis.latitude,dis.count#{serviceId} as count from cs_district dis where dis.count#{serviceId} !=0
order by count desc limit 5

select dis.name,a.name as leakName,COUNT(a.name) AS count from cs_alarm a,cs_district dis
select dis.name,a.name as leakName,COUNT(a.name) AS count from cs_taskwarn a,cs_district dis
where a.districtId = dis.id and a.districtId = #{districtId} and a.serviceId = #{serviceId}
and a.level = 2
group by a.name order by count desc limit 5

select a.name,COUNT(a.name) AS count from cs_alarm a, (select t.taskId,t.group_Id from cs_task t, (select oa.id from cs_order_asset oa, (select o.id from cs_order o where serviceId = #{serviceId}) o1 where o1.id = oa.orderId) oa1 where t.order_asset_Id = oa1.id) t1 where (a.taskId=t1.taskId or a.group_Id = t1.group_Id) and a.level = 2
select a.name,COUNT(a.name) AS count from cs_taskwarn a, (select t.taskId,t.group_Id from cs_task t, (select oa.id from cs_order_asset oa, (select o.id from cs_order o where serviceId = #{serviceId}) o1 where o1.id = oa.orderId) oa1 where t.order_asset_Id = oa1.id) t1 where (a.task_Id=t1.taskId or a.group_Id = t1.group_Id)
group by a.name order by count desc limit 5

select a.months,a.count from (
select DATE_FORMAT(a.alarm_time,'%Y.%m') months,count(a.id) count from cs_alarm a, (select t.taskId,t.group_Id from cs_task t, (select oa.id from cs_order_asset oa, (select o.id from cs_order o where serviceId = #{serviceId}) o1 where o1.id = oa.orderId) oa1 where t.order_asset_Id = oa1.id) t1 where (a.taskId=t1.taskId or a.group_Id = t1.group_Id)
select DATE_FORMAT(a.warn_time,'%Y.%m') months,count(a.id) count from cs_taskwarn a, (select t.taskId,t.group_Id from cs_task t, (select oa.id from cs_order_asset oa, (select o.id from cs_order o where serviceId = #{serviceId}) o1 where o1.id = oa.orderId) oa1 where t.order_asset_Id = oa1.id) t1 where (a.task_Id=t1.taskId or a.group_Id = t1.group_Id)
group by months order by months desc limit 5) a order by a.months
select dis.id,dis.name,dis.longitude,dis.latitude,dis.count#{serviceId} as count from cs_district dis where dis.count#{serviceId} !=0 order by count desc limit 1
select name from cs_district where id=#{provId}
select a.name,COUNT(a.name) AS count from cs_alarm a where a.serviceId=1 and a.name <> '' group by a.name order by count desc limit 5
SELECT count(*) userCount,user1.industry FROM `cs_user` user1 group by user1.industry

select user1.industry,if(isnull(mm.count1),0,mm.count1) orderCount from cs_user user1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT count(order1.id) count1, user2.industry industry from cs_order order1,cs_user user2 WHERE order1.userId=user2.id group by user2.industry)mm on mm.industry=user1.industry group by user1.industry

select count(asset.purpose) count,asset.purpose from cs_asset asset where asset.addr in(select DISTINCT mm.url from (select count(name) AS count,url,name from cs_alarm group by url,name) mm where mm.count>=3) and asset.purpose !='' GROUP BY asset.purpose
